element.name: The Circle by The Bridge Bandits, Unknown Cache (1/1)

font.b: The above co-ordinates are for reference only.

element.long-description:
The above Co-ordinates are not exact and are for reference only, you will need to complete the Puzzle below to obtain the correct co-ordinates.
There's right-of-way access to this cache site via a designated entrance beside a closed gate, there is also an area to park your car close by.
Please do not bring dogs onto the site as there maybe horses grazing from time to time.
Please do not post "Spoilers" which might indicate the cache's location in your Logs, as this will ruin the Puzzle and the game for others. However, close-up photos won't do any harm I'm sure.
The Puzzle
Below is a magic number square. What makes this square "Magic"?
Well I'll tell you; the numbers in each row, colum, and main diagonal lines have the same sum (65).
When the square is complete, the entries will consist of the numbers 1 through to 25,
with no duplicate numbers, and as I've already said, the common sum will be 65.
Cache Co-ordinates:
N53째 D1. (C1xB3)+(D3xE2)
W006째 D1+A5. (E4xC4)+E3
x: Multiple within the brackets first, then add where required.
I have forced a single solution to the puzzle by placing ten numbers in the square, so don't move them.
Good Luck!
FTF gets an un-activated Travel Bug. (Congratulations to Jim & Clo on their FTF)
The cache container is a camouflaged Ammo-box.

ul.li:
2010-06-14T19:00:00Z : Found it by RosMcC
Great place. I enjoyed the little walk across the field, though I'm not so sure the sheep enjoyed having me there. Co-ords. spot on, and led me straight to the cache. TNLNSL Thanks.

2010-05-09T19:00:00Z : Found it by jdunne17
My second cache. Puzzle took a while. But, I'm hooked. in: german-english dictionary out: disposable camera.

2010-04-01T19:00:00Z : Found it by roerne
Hilsen fra DENMARK

2010-03-28T19:00:00Z : Found it by Supergrass
Great location. Took TB Slug. TFTC!

2010-03-07T20:00:00Z : Found it by niripas
Solved the puzzle some time ago. Found the cache just after midnight. Really interesting place. Thanks!
